name: Another Dimension Heroes
description:
This game was made in one week for Godot Wild Jam #20.

"There is no such thing  simple in this reality as a singular universe. There is a multiverse, with many versions of the same being living in different situations. After eons of research and actions designed to understand the existence of many 'selves', scientists have found that the many individuals who share the same physical form also share the same skills, dreams and passions. A set of many versions of beings from this multiverse emerged in order to protect you  from the evil that was increasingly alive. Dialectics is natural in this scenario and, if there is a good initiative, obviously, there will also be its antithesis. A group of space pirates, led by an elite spaceship brought in from the future, TIAMAT, were now in the sights of Another Dimension Heroes. Just survive long enough until another companion arrives. Live until TIAMAT falls."

CONTROLS

W, A, S, D --> Move

MOUSE LEFT BUTTON --> Shoot

MOUSE RIGHT BUTTON --> Special

MOUSE WHEEL --> Camera Zoom

ESC / ENTER --> Pause Menu
